text:
James Van Der Beek in the trailer for Viceland's "What Would Diplo Do?"

Do you ever find yourself in an unusual situation and think to yourself, "What would Diplo do?" You'll find out the answer Aug. 3 as Viceland premieres its first ever scripted series, What Would Diplo Do?, starring Dawson's Creek alum James Van Der Beek in the main role.

The trailer's tongue-in-cheek humor should come at no surprise, given Diplo's comedic sense. The preview even includes a cameo from Diplo's real-life friend and fellow DJ Dillon Francis.

Watch below:
title: James Van Der Beek Is Diplo in Viceland's 'What Would Diplo Do?' Trailer: Watch
